features: SET INCLUDES: 8 inches fry pan, 9.5 inches fry pan and an 11 inches fry pan

HEAT MASTERY SYSTEM: T fal's Heat mastery system is a 3 ingredient recipe for perfectly delicious cooking results every time; Superior and longer lasting non stick coating, an anti warping, even heat base and patented Thermo spot technology

THERMO SPOT INDICATOR: The ring around the spot turns solid red to show when pans are perfectly preheated and ready for ingredients to be added proper preheating is key to sealing in flavor and cooking food evenly
DURABLE NONSTICK: Superior ProGlide toxin free nonstick interior and exterior stands up to rigorous everyday cooking; Allows for cooking without frustrating stuck on messes
RIVETED HANDLES & EVEN HEAT BASES: Stay cool handles are comfortable and secure; Even heat bases ensure superior heat distribution for perfect results every meal
body.description: Experience T fal's Heat Mastery System, a three ingredient recipe for perfectly delicious cooking results every time; Superior and longer lasting non stick coating, an anti warping, even heat base and patented Thermo Spot technology. From Grandma’s tried and true recipes to new ideas from a favorite cooking show, enjoy more Instagram worthy moments with T fal Specialty nonstick cookware. The user friendly cookware features durable aluminum construction that heats quickly and evenly for thorough all over heat. It also provides a step above the rest ProGlide toxin free nonstick surface (inside and out) that stands up to rigorous everyday use to consistently prevent food from sticking. Experience both delicious slide from the pan successful results and simple cleanup - no more tedious scrubbing (or scowling) at the sink needed with T fal Specialty nonstick cookware. For added convenience, T fal makes the important step of pre heating practically foolproof. The Thermo Spot heat indicator features a ring around the center that turns solid red to indicate when pans are properly pre heated, which is key for sealing in natural juices and flavor and cooking food evenly. Oven safe and dishwasher safe, T fal specialty nonstick cookware offers a versatile assortment of pots and pans - perfect for anything from browning and frying to searing, sautéing, steaming, slow cooking and more.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Features and Benefits Durable Nonstick Interior Superior ProGlide non-stick interior and exterior for everyday cooking; heat resistant handles and tempered glass lids Thermo-Spot Technology T-fal exclusive indicator shows when the pan is perfectly preheated and ready to begin cooking Dishwasher Safe For easy clean up Comfortable Handles Ergonomic handles, secure and oven safe up to 350°F

About T-fal For more than 60 years, T-fal has aspired to make the lives of busy home cooks easier by providing ingenious, high-performing and user-friendly cookware that enables a shortcut to desired results, every time. It all started with a simple idea: a non-stick pan that would revolutionize food preparation, transfer and clean up -- allowing you to spend more time enjoying little moments with those you love. Today, as the industry leader in non-stick cookware, T-fal continuously strives to develop innovative product solutions that remove the guesswork and stress in the kitchen – such as T-fal Thermo-Spot - the unique heat indicator technology that shows when the pan is perfectly preheated and ready to begin cooking. T-fal is part of the Groupe SEB global family of brands.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 10, 2020
reviews.reviewText: These pans are tremendous at their price point, and work perfect on my gas oven. I love them.Pros:-Amazingly nonstick. I wanted a quick omelette for my first test. I only had to give the pan two shakes to finish my eggs. After letting the eggs heat up to firm on the bottom I gave the pan one shake to cause one side to fold over, and one final shake to flip it over and finish the other side. The omelette easily slid out onto my plate. I wiped out the pan with a paper towel, and it looks like new. That's true nonstick. No tools, no cleaning, the pan does all the work.-Inexpensive. There are 2 schools for nonstick pans. One says you should buy a really expensive, maybe a ceramic Le Creuset type pan, which will last a long time and give the best experience. The other says you should go with something relatively inexpensive like this T-Fal set, because you know over time someone in your family is going to be an idiot and scrape the coating off your pans with metal utensils. I'm in the latter camp, so I absolutely love this set.Cons:-None. As said, so long as you're in the school where you'd prefer inexpensive nonstick pans, these things are wonders. Sure they don't retain heat like a big ceramic, sure a heavier pan could distribute heat better. But these are amazing at their price point, and their heat distribution is way better than you'd expect.Overall:This is my go-to for nonstick pans. Get something inexpensive, and in 5+ years when they're starting to get scraped up from misuse, you don't feel bad about replacing them. My mom's the type to always go for the heavy ceramic nonstick, and it kills her every time she has to replace one - but that doesn't stop her from damaging the coating with metal implements all the time either! I'd rather use my T-Fal, it makes me happy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wonderful pan set, the best
reviews.reviewText: This skillet set is excellent. It's durable, anti-scorching, non stick, and cooks your meals with an even temperature. I'd buy this set again and do recommend. Regarding the red dot heat indicator, it does not activate when the pans are hot. I even turned off my kitchen lights to see if there was a faint light, but nothing. Otherwise, the pans are amazing and I do recommend. 👍

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These pans are ideal for my cooking requirements. The 3 sizes all come in handy for different meals and they are easy to clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 18, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Used the smallest fry pan to fry eggs... seasoned the pans according to manual directions. Did not use commercial cooking spray (all of the cooking website reviews said not to) used canola oil, lightly. Everything went okay until it was time to flip the eggs.... they stuck just enough to break the yolks... but then slipped right out of the pan. Clean up was simple and easy. These pans cost $37.42 and for 3 non stick fry pans... that is a good price. I am replacing my Circulon fry pans after 10 years because the anodized coating is coming off. Checked many cooking sites and reviewing sites.. and bought these because they had good reviews at a price I was comfortable with. Preformed better than the "copper" and "diamond" brands and at a better price (from Amazon).I did have some problems registering for warranty... the model/serial number on the box was damaged. The product registration form would not accept any of the numbers I tried and I could not find the exact product combo on the T-fal website. I finally emailed customer service at t-fal.com and sent them a photos of the box info panel and fry pans and received a reply that says my product has been registered.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great pans, but don't stack them without insulation. Privets are good.
reviews.reviewText: I love these pans. They heat evenly, handles are not hot and the non-stick is amazing. Just don't stack them together without something between them. The bottoms of these pans are very abrasive with any movement. Get some cheap silicone privets and put them between the pans when storing. And don't use anything metal or abrasive to clean them and they will last forever. Enjoy your omelets and easy cleanup!
